explanation.intro: NBA 2K26 introduces Crew Rewards for the first time. These rewards incentivize players to join a crew and play with other players in their crew to receive additional boosts and bonuses.
explanation.details: Some of these bonuses can be incredibly impactful such as additional cap breakers, infinite Gatorade and Skill boosts, Badge Max +1s and more. These rewards are going to take your build to another level.
explanation.rewards: Play games to earn CXP for the Crew. Earn a bonus when your team is made up of Crew members. Complete Weekly Challenges for big CXP gains. Unlock rewards across 30 levels.

rewards.reward: Play games to earn CXP for the Crew. Earn a bonus when your team is made up of Crew members. Complete Weekly Challenges for big CXP gains. Unlock rewards across 30 levels.
